keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The suicide bombing on Friday killed at least 21 worshipers at a Shiite mosque in a town near Qatif, in the Eastern Province.

headline.print_headline: Saudis Say ISIS Ordered Suicide Bombing of Mosque
headline.main: Saudis Say ISIS Ordered Suicide Bombing of Mosque

snippet: The suicide bombing on Friday killed at least 21 worshipers at a Shiite mosque in a town near Qatif, in the Eastern Province.
abstract: Saudi Interior Ministry identifies suicide bomber who killed 21 people at Shiite mosque in town near Qatif as Salih bin Abdulrahman Salih al-Ghishaami, Saudi citizen who acted at behest of Islamic State.
